long_description: The Shimano BR7900 / 6700 cartridge-style replacement brake pads allow worn pads to be replaced without having to buy new brake shoes. New pad compound allows for more stopping power on wet surfaces. Pad slides into shoe holder for quick replacement; requires 2mm Allen wrench. Compatible with Shimano Dura-Ace BR7900 and Ultegra BR6700 cartridge brake shoes. Includes 2 pads.
short_description: The Shimano BR7900 / 6700 cartridge-style replacement brake pads allow worn pads to be replaced without having to buy new brake shoes.
